alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 29 at 9:50PM CDT until June 30 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nebraska... South Platte River near Roscoe affecting Deuel and Keith Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...The river has fallen just below flood stage and should continue to gradually lower. * WHERE...South Platte River near Roscoe. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Flood Stage. Minor flooding of agricultural land along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near 8.9 feet tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.9 feet on 07/22/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun South Platte River Roscoe 9.0 8.9 Thu 8 pm MDT 8.5 7.9 7.3 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning around 800 AM MDT.
